TopicTitle: Vehicle has glitchy speed on launch

Articles.Content:
On launch, my vessel (just a mark 1 pod, a parachute, and the first SRB) has navball velocity of about 180 m/s, and drifts gently upwards. the log spams:

[LOG 13:13:49.704] getObtAtUT result is NaN! UT: NaN
[LOG 13:13:49.705] getObtAtUT result is NaN! UT: NaN
[LOG 13:13:49.706] getObtAtUT result is NaN! UT: NaN
[LOG 13:13:49.707] problem! 
[NaN, NaN, NaN]  -  [NaN, NaN, NaN]  -  NaN  -  [NaN, NaN, NaN] - NaN
[LOG 13:13:49.708] getObtAtUT result is NaN! UT: NaN
[LOG 13:13:49.709] problem! 
[NaN, NaN, NaN]  -  [NaN, NaN, NaN]  -  NaN  -  [NaN, NaN, NaN] - NaN
[LOG 13:13:49.732] problem! 
[NaN, NaN, NaN]  -  [NaN, NaN, NaN]  -  NaN  -  [NaN, NaN, NaN] - NaN
[LOG 13:13:49.733] dT is NaN! tA: NaN, E: 3.14159265358979, M: -8.40714670366795, T: NaN
[LOG 13:13:49.734] dT is NaN! tA: NaN, E: 3.14159265358979, M: -8.40714670366795, T: NaN
[LOG 13:13:49.734] getObtAtUT result is NaN! UT: NaN
[LOG 13:13:49.735] getObtAtUT result is NaN! UT: NaN
[LOG 13:13:49.736] getObtAtUT result is NaN! UT: NaN
[LOG 13:13:49.737] problem! 
[NaN, NaN, NaN]  -  [NaN, NaN, NaN]  -  NaN  -  [NaN, NaN, NaN] - NaN
[LOG 13:13:49.738] getObtAtUT result is NaN! UT: NaN
[LOG 13:13:49.738] problem! 
[NaN, NaN, NaN]  -  [NaN, NaN, NaN]  -  NaN  -  [NaN, NaN, NaN] - NaN
[LOG 13:13:49.755] problem! 
[NaN, NaN, NaN]  -  [NaN, NaN, NaN]  -  NaN  -  [NaN, NaN, NaN] - NaN
[LOG 13:13:49.756] dT is NaN! tA: NaN, E: 3.14159265358979, M: -8.40714670366795, T: NaN

over and over.

mechjeb reports that my ship is in space above kerbin's shores.

the log is at https://www.dropbox.com/s/sofyt37q2dsoggg/KSP.log?dl=0

Please follow the advice in the sticky thread at the top of this sub-forum that explains how to report problems in a useful manner (especially the bits about the output_log.txt/player.log file rather than KSP.log and the list of mods).
